00051 class MultiBodyTree::InitCache {

00060                                 const mat33 &body_I_body, const int user_int, void *user_ptr);
00063         int buildIndexSets();

00067         int numBodies() const { return m_inertias.size(); }

00077         int getJointData(const int index, JointData *joint) const;
00080         void getParentIndexArray(idArray<int>::type *parent_index) { *parent_index = m_parent_index; }

00091 
00092 private:
00093         // vector of bodies
00094         idArray<InertiaData>::type m_inertias;
00095         // vector of joints
00096         idArray<JointData>::type m_joints;
00097         // number of mechanical degrees of freedom
00098         int m_num_dofs;

00100         idArray<int>::type m_parent_index;
00101         // user integers
00102         idArray<int>::type m_user_int;
